message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate!
I'll give you 400k, but I think I deserve more
That's too low, I'm worth more than 400k
Meet me in the middle, 45% for me, 55% for you
I'll give you 300k, but I think I'm getting closer to a fair deal
300k is still too low, I want more
Getting closer to a deal, but I'm still not sure
I'll give you 200k, but I think I'm getting closer to my target
200k is still too low, I want a better deal
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better offer from you
I'll give you 100k, but I'm getting desperate, I want more
100k is still too low, I'm not giving up yet
I'm running out of patience, but I still want a fair deal
I'll give you 20k, but I'm almost out of time, I want as much as possible
20k is almost nothing, I'm not giving up yet
I'm running out of time, this is my final offer
I'll give you 10k, but I'm out of options, this is my last chance
Fine, I'll take 10k, it's better than nothing
